ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of <u>intellectual challenge</u> of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the <u>workload</u> of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I was able to write a lengthy paper on a topic which had been of interest to me throughout my time at Yale. I learned how to develop those thoughts throughout the course of such a long paper, and how to connect those seemingly disparate ideas.
Writing a senior thesis was the most rewarding experience Ive had at Yale. It provides an opportunity to delve deeply into a topic thats interesting to you.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: I wish we had gotten more guidance from the Philosophy Department about what the expectations were for the senior essay.

I found the course to be a far better option for fulfilling the senior requirement in philosophy than a senior seminar because I could develop my own project. I cannot think of any weaknesses regarding the class.

I think the success of a senior thesis has a lot to do with the adviser. My adviser was very involved, we met weekly, and he provided careful and lengthy feedback at every step. Because of Professor Winklers involvement I got so much more out of my thesis than I could have anticipated.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes, if you'd like the opportunity to spend a semester focusing on one paper. I really enjoyed working one-on-one with my advisor and found it to be a unique learning experience. I'm happy I took the Senior Essay.

I would absolutely recommend taking this route to fulfill the senior philosophy requirement if you have a specific interest that cant quite be explored in the regular seminar offerings in the department.
Absolutely. Writing a senior thesis is the most rewarding experience Ive had at Yale.
